Detailed Description

Author:
P-A Delsart
Date:
Dec. 2014

Tool to remove constituents of a jet. Used to maximaly reduce the truth jet sizes in pile-up evgen files.

Member Function Documentation

Method to modify a jet. Returns 0 for success.
